Text:
"The only REAL holocaust is the one the jew have and are still commiting against the Palestinians."
And the one that occure in the Auchwitz, and the one that occured in India. Althought Jews did experience a holocaust a few decades ago, it does not justify the actions of Israel. Nor does Israel's actions justify claiming that the Jewish holocaust did not occur. By your reasoning we can say that 9/11 was not a massacre because Americans in previous generations slaughtered Indians prior to settling hence American deaths are meaningless.
Thank YOU !  I was "dying" to get this.  This was a superb show.
Thank you for this upload. I will seed indefinitely.
